alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 5:28PM CDT until May 22 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER COUNTY... At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boyd, or 15 miles southwest of Beaver, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Bryans Corner, Balko and Boyd. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
